name: places/ChIJr7lXPwn2wokRYugBYRQ-cvU
formattedAddress: 1735 Park Ave #300, New York, NY 10035, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1735 Park Ave #300, New York, NY 10035, USA

originalText.text:
Let me start off by saying this. If you want to get apartments from here because they look 'nice' you're making a grave mistake. The management here is horrible. They will only do their job if you report them to 311. If you want to make a complaint to them, do any type of forms, or even reach somebody for any reason good luck.

Either they are extremely understaffed or they hire incompetent staff. There is also no office to walk into. Which makes sense, if there was they couldn't keep spinning people in circles. Since there are none they're able to string you along through voicemails, emails, unanswered phone calls. I'm certain with enough reporting to the STATE the management will be forced to change how they handle their services to their tenants.

originalText.text:
I live in a brand new building managed by C & C Apartment Management, love my apartment however I have some complains.
I've tried to contact management via email multiple times, all non successful due to no response. My main complain is the nasty smoke odor I have in my bathroom. I would like to remark that my contract states the building I'm residing is SMOKE FREE. But a stronger smoke odor vents in my bathroom day and night. I can't no longer tolerate the smell. The horrible smell is getting penetrated in my bathroom furniture and walls . Most important I'm asthmatic and afraid my health could be comprised ! I'm highly disappointment  I've not got an answer until present day. I had no other choice but to leave a google review. I'm  also shock of all the complains I've read here and nobody from management seems to care. I hope each tenant is being contact privately and hopefully I get an answer soon.

originalText.text:
I live in a brand new building owned by C&C management. Love my apartment.
My only issue is some of these lazy and rude workers. Can’t reach anyone. I’ve sent numerous emails, voicemails, stopped by the office and can’t even get in. They work from home or u need an appointment to see someone. Finally get through on the phone to ask questions and find out what happened to the signed documents I’ve sent numerous times. Only to speak to the rudest, most disrespectful worker named Brie.

They really need to work on respect and knowing how to conduct themselves in a more professional manner! We are TENANTS. Without us they would have no job here ! Period

originalText.text:
I am seeing the many complaints against C&C Management, I Concur with them, and can verify this occurs, and is not isolated incidents. I live in a building that is managed by C&C Management, where they allow criminals to come into my building (security guards allow them in, upon instructions from the C&C Site Manager), even though they are criminally trespassed not to return to the building. The Management allows the trespassers in, who are a danger to tenants. The management has been bringing in very bad new tenants to harass senior citizens out of their apartments, so more money can be charged for those apartments.
Everyone needs to know that C&C Management Company is a contracted management company, they are hired to manage buildings for owners of buildings. When C&C Management is unresponsive and/or unprofessional, best take it up with the owners of your building(s). You need to find out who the owners are.
In my building, the owners are the Housing Settlement Fund (a non-profit organization). Please, note that the Settlement Fund building owners do not respond to calls either, and apparently C&C management is fulfilling the Settlement  Fund's wishes to ignore complaints  and create/continue dangersous situations. including all the problems that we are having in our building, and others are having presently in their buildings managed by C&C management. C&C Management's contract for 2024, with my building, has not been renewed by the Settlement Fund, the actual building owners, apparently due to many valid tenant complaints.
Best for people to contact your local city Council Representative, your state senator, and Congressman regarding building management issues. Show them this Google Maps review page.
We all have the same complaints and issues about C&C Management. Remember, management sets the tone from the top - down. If the upper management  is unprofessional, their employees will be as well. If you find that a building is managed by C&C management, be most aware and wary.
The C&C management company does not own buildings, they are a contracted management company. You could contact the police, and call 311, and DOCUMENT ALL YOUR CALLS as proof. As well, you can take any management company to landlord tenant court, or seek out an attorney who would represent the tenants of your building(s) whom are experiencing neglected, unlawful, unhealthful, and/or hazardous conditions.

originalText.text: The plan to beautify Linden Houses is destroying our beloved trees. I can see cutting down trees that are a hazard. But I seen with my own eyes the destruction of some of Lindens most magnificent trees being cut down. Its heartbreaking and an abomination.  For what. A plan. It makes no sense. Stop the madness.
